text: Veshangal is a 1981 Indian Malayalam film directed by KA Shivadas. ==Cast== * Sukumaran * Seema * Jose * Ambika ==Singers== K. J. Yesudas, S. Janaki, P. Jayachandran ==References== ==External links== * Category:1981 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
